existing_features.title: Remove the time offset adjustment UI component from the homepage that displays 'Saat Düzeltmesi' (Clock Adjustment), 'Diyanet'e göre dakika farkı (+ veya -)' label, the offset input control, and current adjustment display ('Şu anki düzeltme: X dakika'), since this functionality already exists in the Settings page

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove clock adjustment window from homepage (duplicate of settings page feature)
